roadmap.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn the basics of web structure and styling. Understand HTML tags, attributes, forms, and semantic elements. Master CSS selectors, box model, flexbox, and responsive design.

videos.title: HTML Full Course for Beginners - YouTube

projects: Build a personal portfolio page
Create a simple landing page with responsive layout

roadmap.title: JavaScript Basics
roadmap.description: Understand the fundamentals of JavaScript: variables, data types, operators, loops, functions, and DOM manipulation.

projects: Build a to-do list app
Create a digital clock with JavaScript

roadmap.title: Frontend Frameworks
roadmap.description: Learn modern frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue. Focus on React as it’s industry-standard. Understand JSX, components, props, state, and hooks.

projects: Build a weather app with React
Create a movie search app using an API

roadmap.title: Learn a Backend Programming Language
roadmap.description: Choose a backend language like Node.js (JavaScript), Python, Java, or Go. Build comfort with syntax, OOP concepts, and handling data.

courses: Node.js Tutorial for Beginners - Programming with Mosh (YouTube)
projects: Build a CLI Calculator
Create a basic REST API that serves static data

roadmap.title: Learn Databases (SQL & NoSQL)
roadmap.description: Understand relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB). Learn CRUD operations, joins, indexing, and optimization.

projects: Create a Student Management System
Build a blog backend with MongoDB

roadmap.title: Understand REST APIs
roadmap.description: Learn to design and implement RESTful APIs using frameworks like Express.js, Django, or Spring Boot.

courses: REST API Crash Course - Traversy Media (YouTube)
Build RESTful APIs with Django - Coursera
Java Spring Boot REST API - Udemy
projects: Build a To-Do List API
Develop a Notes Taking API with CRUD functionality

roadmap.title: Authentication & Authorization
roadmap.description: Implement authentication using JWT, OAuth, and session-based methods. Understand security best practices like hashing passwords and CSRF protection.

projects: Create a Login/Signup system
Implement JWT-based authentication in a blog API

roadmap.title: Learn Advanced Backend Concepts
roadmap.description: Focus on caching (Redis), message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka), microservices, and WebSockets for real-time applications.

projects: Build a real-time chat application
Implement caching in an e-commerce backend

roadmap.title: Testing & Deployment
roadmap.description: Learn unit testing (Mocha, Jest, PyTest), CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker), and deployment on AWS/GCP/Azure.

projects: Write tests for an API
Deploy a backend on AWS/GCP

roadmap.title: Capstone Project
roadmap.description: Combine everything into a large project to showcase backend skills.

projects: Build an E-commerce Backend (with authentication, cart, payments, and orders)
Create a social media backend with real-time chat, notifications, and follow system

roadmap.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn the basics of web structure and styling. Understand HTML tags, attributes, forms, and semantic elements. Master CSS selectors, box model, flexbox, grid, and responsive design.

videos.title: HTML Full Course for Beginners - YouTube

projects: Build a personal portfolio page
Create a responsive landing page

roadmap.title: JavaScript Basics
roadmap.description: Understand the fundamentals of JavaScript: variables, data types, operators, loops, functions, ES6 features, and DOM manipulation.

projects: Build a to-do list app
Create a digital clock with JavaScript

roadmap.title: Frontend Frameworks
roadmap.description: Learn modern frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue. Focus on React as it’s industry-standard. Understand JSX, components, props, state, hooks, and routing.

projects: Build a weather app with React
Create a movie search app using an API

roadmap.title: Backend Development
roadmap.description: Learn how to build servers and APIs. Start with Node.js and Express or Python with Django/Flask. Understand routing, middleware, REST APIs, and error handling.

projects: Build a notes API
Develop a blog backend with Express.js

roadmap.title: Databases (SQL & NoSQL)
roadmap.description: Learn relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB). Understand schemas, queries, indexing, relationships, and optimization.

projects: Create a student records database
Build a blog database schema with MongoDB

roadmap.title: Authentication & Security
roadmap.description: Implement authentication using JWT, OAuth, and sessions. Learn to hash passwords and secure APIs from threats like SQL injection and XSS.

projects: Build a login/signup system
Create a JWT-secured API

roadmap.title: Deployment & DevOps Basics
roadmap.description: Learn Git, Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and deploy applications on platforms like Heroku, Netlify, AWS, or Vercel.

projects: Deploy a full stack app on Heroku
Dockerize a Node.js application

roadmap.title: Capstone Project
roadmap.description: Combine frontend and backend skills into a single real-world application.

projects: Build an e-commerce web application (with authentication, product catalog, cart, payments)
Create a social media platform (with posts, comments, likes, and real-time chat)

roadmap.title: Linux & Command Line Basics
roadmap.description: Learn fundamental Linux commands, file system navigation, permissions, and shell scripting. These are the backbone of DevOps work.

projects: Write a shell script to automate backups
Set up user permissions for a small team on Linux

roadmap.title: Version Control with Git & GitHub
roadmap.description: Master Git basics including commits, branches, merging, rebasing, and collaboration via GitHub. This is critical for CI/CD workflows.

projects: Create a GitHub repository and collaborate with a friend
Manage branching and merging in a sample project

roadmap.title: CI/CD (Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment)
roadmap.description: Understand the concepts of automated testing, integration, and deployment. Learn tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI/CD.

projects: Set up a GitHub Actions pipeline for a Node.js app
Configure Jenkins for a sample CI/CD pipeline

roadmap.title: Containerization with Docker
roadmap.description: Learn how to build, ship, and run applications inside containers using Docker. Understand Dockerfiles, images, volumes, and networking.

projects: Dockerize a simple Node.js app
Create a Docker Compose setup with multiple services

roadmap.title: Container Orchestration with Kubernetes
roadmap.description: Learn Kubernetes for scaling and managing containers. Understand pods, services, deployments, config maps, and ingress.

projects: Deploy a multi-container app with Kubernetes
Implement auto-scaling in a Kubernetes cluster

roadmap.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Terraform or Ansible to automate infrastructure provisioning. Understand declarative infrastructure and cloud automation.

projects: Provision AWS infrastructure with Terraform
Automate server configuration using Ansible

roadmap.title: Monitoring & Logging
roadmap.description: Set up monitoring and logging systems for applications and infrastructure. Use tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack.

projects: Set up Grafana dashboards for a sample app
Implement centralized logging with ELK

roadmap.title: Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
roadmap.description: Learn cloud computing concepts and deploy apps to AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Understand services like EC2, S3, IAM, and load balancers.

projects: Deploy a web app on AWS EC2
Host a static site on Google Cloud Storage

roadmap.title: Mathematics & Statistics Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Build strong foundations in linear algebra, probability, statistics, and calculus as they form the backbone of machine learning and AI.

projects: Implement matrix operations in Python
Build a probability distribution visualizer

roadmap.title: Programming with Python
roadmap.description: Learn Python for AI development. Master libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib for data handling and visualization.

projects: Write a data cleaner script using Pandas
Build a simple data visualizer with Matplotlib

roadmap.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn supervised and unsupervised algorithms, model evaluation, overfitting, and hyperparameter tuning.

courses.title: Machine Learning by Andrew Ng - Coursera

projects: Build a spam email classifier
Train a house price prediction model

roadmap.title: Deep Learning & Neural Networks
roadmap.description: Understand neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, and transformers. Use TensorFlow and PyTorch for building models.

projects: Build an image classifier using CNN
Create a text sentiment analysis model

roadmap.title: AI Deployment & MLOps
roadmap.description: Learn how to deploy AI models into production using Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms. Understand model monitoring and scaling.

courses.title: Deploying ML Models with Docker & Flask - Udemy

videos.title: Deploy ML Models with Flask - YouTube

projects: Deploy a deep learning model with Flask & Docker
Create a CI/CD pipeline for ML model updates

roadmap.title: Excel & Spreadsheets
roadmap.description: Learn Excel basics, formulas, pivot tables, and data visualization as they are widely used in business analytics.

projects: Create a sales dashboard in Excel
Analyze company expenses with pivot tables

roadmap.title: SQL for Data Analysis
roadmap.description: Master SQL queries, joins, aggregations, and window functions to extract and manipulate data from databases.

projects: Analyze e-commerce data with SQL queries
Create a customer segmentation report using SQL

roadmap.title: Data Visualization
roadmap.description: Learn to communicate insights using visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, and Matplotlib/Seaborn in Python.

projects: Build a Tableau sales dashboard
Visualize COVID-19 data in Python

roadmap.title: Python for Data Analysis
roadmap.description: Use Python libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Seaborn for data wrangling, cleaning, and exploratory data analysis (EDA).

projects: Analyze Netflix dataset with Pandas
Perform EDA on stock market data

roadmap.title: Business Intelligence & Reporting
roadmap.description: Learn to generate insights and reports for business decision-making. Use dashboards, KPIs, and storytelling with data.

projects: Create a KPI dashboard for a business case
Build a customer churn analysis report

roadmap.title: Mathematics & Statistics
roadmap.description: Learn the foundations of statistics, probability, linear algebra, and calculus. Focus on descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, distributions, and matrices.

articles.title: Statistics for Data Science - Towards Data Science

projects: Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) on a public dataset
Visualize distributions and correlations using Python

roadmap.title: Programming for Data Science (Python/R)
roadmap.description: Master Python and R for data manipulation, visualization, and analysis. Learn libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

videos.title: Python for Data Science Crash Course - YouTube

projects: Analyze stock market data with Python
Build data visualizations using Matplotlib and Seaborn

roadmap.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn supervised and unsupervised ML algorithms such as regression, classification, clustering, and decision trees.

projects: Predict house prices using linear regression
Customer segmentation using clustering

roadmap.title: Java/Kotlin Basics
roadmap.description: Learn object-oriented programming with Java or Kotlin, focusing on variables, loops, functions, classes, and inheritance.

projects: Build a basic calculator app
Create a note-taking app with Java/Kotlin

roadmap.title: Android Basics
roadmap.description: Learn about activities, intents, layouts, UI components, and Android Studio basics.

projects: Build a weather app using API
Create a simple to-do list app

roadmap.description: Learn Fragments, RecyclerView, Room Database, Networking, and Jetpack Components.

projects: Build a movie database app using API
Create a chat app with Firebase

roadmap.title: Swift Programming Basics
roadmap.description: Learn the fundamentals of Swift including variables, data types, control flow, functions, and object-oriented programming.

projects: Create a calculator app using Swift
Build a simple text-based game

roadmap.title: Xcode & iOS Basics
roadmap.description: Set up Xcode, learn Interface Builder, Storyboards, AutoLayout, and create your first iOS app.

projects: Build a notes-taking app
Design a simple stopwatch app

roadmap.title: iOS Frameworks & APIs
roadmap.description: Learn UIKit, SwiftUI, Core Data, networking with URLSession, JSON parsing, and integrating REST APIs.

projects: Create a weather app with SwiftUI and REST API
Build a to-do list app with Core Data

roadmap.title: Programming & SQL
roadmap.description: Learn Python/Java for data engineering tasks. Master SQL for querying and manipulating databases.

projects: Build a student records SQL database
Automate CSV to database import with Python

roadmap.title: Data Warehousing & ETL
roadmap.description: Learn ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pipelines, data lakes, and warehousing concepts with tools like Apache Airflow, Talend, and Snowflake.

projects: Build an ETL pipeline using Airflow
Create a data warehouse schema for sales data

roadmap.description: Understand distributed data systems like Hadoop and Spark. Learn cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, and Azure for data engineering.

courses.title: Big Data with Hadoop & Spark - Coursera

projects: Process large log files using Spark
Deploy a data pipeline on AWS

roadmap.title: Mathematics & Python Basics
roadmap.description: Learn linear algebra, probability, statistics, and calculus basics. Master Python for ML, including NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

projects: Implement linear regression from scratch
Analyze a dataset with Pandas

roadmap.title: Supervised & Unsupervised Learning
roadmap.description: Learn supervised ML algorithms like regression, classification, decision trees, and unsupervised learning like clustering and PCA.

courses.title: Machine Learning by Andrew Ng - Coursera

projects: Build a spam email classifier
Cluster customers based on purchase history

roadmap.title: Deep Learning & Advanced ML
roadmap.description: Learn neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, transformers, and reinforcement learning with frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.

projects: Build an image classifier using CNNs
Create a sentiment analysis model using RNNs

roadmap.title: Software Design Principles
roadmap.description: Learn SOLID principles, design patterns, modular design, and clean code practices.

projects: Implement Singleton and Factory patterns in a project
Refactor an existing app using SOLID principles

roadmap.title: System Design & Architecture
roadmap.description: Understand system design concepts like scalability, load balancing, caching, microservices, and database design.

projects: Design a URL shortener like Bitly
Create a system design document for an e-commerce app

roadmap.title: Enterprise Architecture & Cloud
roadmap.description: Explore enterprise-level architecture including microservices, event-driven systems, DevOps integration, and cloud-native design.

projects: Design a microservices-based chat application
Implement event-driven architecture with Kafka

roadmap.title: Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn the basics of software testing: manual testing, black-box vs white-box testing, test cases, bug tracking, and SDLC.

projects: Write test cases for a simple web app
Perform manual testing on an open-source project

roadmap.title: Automation Testing
roadmap.description: Learn Selenium, Cypress, or Playwright for automated testing. Understand API testing with Postman and automation frameworks.

projects: Automate login testing for a website
Build a test suite for an e-commerce site

roadmap.title: Performance & CI/CD Testing
roadmap.description: Explore load testing (JMeter, Locust), CI/CD pipeline integration (Jenkins, GitHub Actions), and test reporting tools.

projects: Set up a Jenkins pipeline with automated tests
Run load tests on a web application

roadmap.title: Blockchain Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand what blockchain is, how it works, consensus mechanisms, and cryptographic basics.

projects: Write a paper explaining proof-of-work vs proof-of-stake
Simulate a simple blockchain in Python

roadmap.title: Smart Contracts & Solidity
roadmap.description: Learn Solidity to write smart contracts on Ethereum. Understand Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), tokens (ERC-20, ERC-721), and contract deployment.

projects: Create an ERC-20 token
Build a decentralized voting app

roadmap.title: DApps & Blockchain Platforms
roadmap.description: Build decentralized applications using Web3.js, Truffle, or Hardhat. Explore other blockchains like Polygon, Solana, and Hyperledger.

projects: Create a decentralized marketplace
Develop an NFT minting platform

roadmap.title: Networking & Security Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand computer networks, TCP/IP, firewalls, VPNs, and basic security concepts like authentication, encryption, and hashing.

projects: Set up a firewall and test access control

roadmap.title: Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
roadmap.description: Learn about vulnerabilities, exploits, and penetration testing. Practice using tools like Kali Linux, Metasploit, Wireshark, and Burp Suite.

Run vulnerability scans using Nessus

roadmap.title: Advanced Security & Specializations
roadmap.description: Dive into incident response, digital forensics, cloud security, and security automation. Explore SIEM tools like Splunk and threat intelligence.

projects: Set up a SIEM for log monitoring
Investigate a simulated cyberattack

roadmap.title: Programming & Game Math
roadmap.description: Learn a programming language for game development (C++, C#, or Python). Understand game loops, physics, vectors, and linear algebra basics.

projects: Create a basic 2D Pong game
Develop a text-based adventure game

roadmap.title: Game Engines
roadmap.description: Learn Unity (C#) or Unreal Engine (C++/Blueprints). Understand scenes, assets, physics, animation, and game mechanics.

projects: Build a 3D platformer in Unity
Create a first-person shooter in Unreal Engine

roadmap.title: Advanced Game Development
roadmap.description: Learn multiplayer networking, game optimization, shaders, AR/VR, and publishing games to different platforms.

projects: Build a multiplayer chat system

projects: Design a mobile login screen in Figma
Redesign an existing website’s homepage

roadmap.description: Understand UX principles, user journeys, wireframing, personas, and usability testing. Learn about information architecture.

projects: Conduct a usability test on a mobile app
Create wireframes for a dashboard

roadmap.description: Build high-fidelity prototypes, interactive mockups, and learn motion design. Explore design systems and accessibility standards.

projects: Build a full mobile app prototype in Figma

roadmap.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. Learn about data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.

projects: Build a spam email classifier

roadmap.description: Learn CI/CD for ML, model versioning, experiment tracking, and monitoring. Get familiar with tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, and DVC.

roadmap.description: Learn to deploy ML models as APIs using Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud services (AWS Sagemaker, GCP AI Platform, Azure ML). Focus on scalability and monitoring.

projects: Deploy a ML model using FastAPI and Docker
Build a Kubernetes pipeline for real-time predictions

roadmap.description: Learn the basics of product lifecycle, roadmapping, prioritization frameworks (MoSCoW, RICE), and stakeholder management.

videos.title: What Does a Product Manager Do? - YouTube

projects: Draft a product roadmap for a new app idea
Create a feature prioritization matrix

roadmap.title: Market Research & UX
roadmap.description: Learn user research, competitive analysis, personas, journey mapping, and usability testing. Collaborate with design and UX teams.

articles.title: How to Do Market Research - HubSpot

courses.title: UX Design for Product Managers - Udemy

projects: Conduct a competitor analysis
Build personas for a target audience

roadmap.title: Advanced Product Strategy
roadmap.description: Focus on growth metrics, analytics, agile methodologies, product-led growth (PLG), and working with cross-functional teams.

projects: Define KPIs for a SaaS product
Run a sprint planning session

roadmap.description: Learn relational databases, SQL queries, normalization, indexing, and data modeling.

courses.title: Databases and SQL for Data Science - Coursera

projects: Design a student management database
Write complex SQL queries with joins

roadmap.title: Database Management Systems
roadmap.description: Learn MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and SQL Server. Understand backup, recovery, replication, and clustering.

projects: Set up replication between two MySQL servers
Implement backup and recovery strategy

roadmap.title: Advanced DBA & Cloud Databases
roadmap.description: Focus on performance tuning, query optimization, security, and cloud databases (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Google Cloud SQL).

projects: Migrate an on-prem database to AWS RDS
Optimize queries for a high-traffic application

roadmap.title: PostgreSQL Basics
roadmap.description: Learn the fundamentals of PostgreSQL, installation, database creation, tables, and basic queries.

projects: Set up a PostgreSQL database and create a sample table
Build a CRUD application using PostgreSQL

roadmap.title: Intermediate PostgreSQL
roadmap.description: Understand joins, indexes, constraints, stored procedures, triggers, and advanced querying techniques.

projects: Design a library management system
Implement stored procedures for data validation

roadmap.title: Advanced PostgreSQL & Administration
roadmap.description: Focus on database optimization, performance tuning, replication, partitioning, and security best practices.

projects: Set up PostgreSQL replication for high availability
Optimize queries for a real-world dataset

roadmap.title: RDBMS Basics
roadmap.description: Learn what RDBMS is, relational model, tables, schemas, and ER diagrams. Understand the role of primary keys, foreign keys, and constraints.

projects: Design an ER diagram for a university database
Build a simple employee management database

roadmap.title: SQL Mastery
roadmap.description: Learn SQL queries, joins, subqueries, views, transactions, and stored procedures. Explore normalization and indexing.

projects: Write complex queries on a sales database
Create a view to analyze student grades

roadmap.title: Advanced RDBMS Concepts
roadmap.description: Learn concurrency control, transaction management, ACID properties, query optimization, and database security.

projects: Implement transaction management in SQL
Optimize queries in a large dataset

roadmap.description: Understand the difference between SQL and NoSQL. Learn types of NoSQL databases: key-value, document, column-family, and graph databases.

projects: Create a key-value store with Redis

roadmap.title: Working with Document Databases
roadmap.description: Learn MongoDB and CouchDB. Understand CRUD operations, indexing, aggregation, and schema design.

projects: Build a REST API with MongoDB and Node.js
Design a shopping cart system using MongoDB

roadmap.title: Advanced NoSQL & Scaling
roadmap.description: Learn database sharding, replication, CAP theorem, eventual consistency, and scaling strategies in NoSQL systems.

projects: Implement sharding in MongoDB
Build a distributed chat application using NoSQL

roadmap.description: Learn what Business Intelligence (BI) is, understand data warehouses, ETL processes, and reporting basics.

roadmap.description: Master BI tools like Power BI, Tableau, and Looker. Learn dimensional modeling, star/snowflake schemas, and OLAP cubes.

roadmap.description: Deep dive into at least one major provider: AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Learn core services like compute, storage, networking, and databases.

roadmap.description: Focus on designing scalable, cost-efficient, and secure cloud solutions. Learn cloud architecture best practices, security compliance, and automation.

roadmap.description: Understand the role of operating systems, process management, memory management, and I/O systems.

roadmap.description: Dive into concurrency, synchronization, deadlocks, paging, segmentation, and file systems.

roadmap.description: Explore network security, firewalls, VPNs, and advanced protocols. Learn wireless networking and cloud networking.

roadmap.description: Deep dive into RDS, Lambda, VPC, CloudFront, and Load Balancers. Learn infrastructure as code with CloudFormation.

roadmap.description: Learn the history of C, its importance, and how to set up a compiler (GCC, MinGW, or IDEs like Code::Blocks, VS Code). Understand the structure of a C program, variables, data types, and operators.

roadmap.description: Learn ethical hacking techniques: reconnaissance, scanning, exploitation, and post-exploitation.

projects: Perform a vulnerability scan on a test website
Simulate a penetration test in a virtual lab environment

roadmap.title: Deep Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand neural networks, activation functions, forward/backward propagation, loss functions, and optimization techniques.

articles.title: Deep Learning Basics - Towards Data Science

projects: Build a simple image classifier using TensorFlow/Keras
Train a neural network to predict numerical data

roadmap.title: Advanced Deep Learning
roadmap.description: Learn CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, GANs, and attention mechanisms for complex AI tasks.

Develop a text sentiment classifier using LSTMs

roadmap.title: NLP Basics
roadmap.description: Understand text preprocessing, tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and basic NLP libraries like NLTK and spaCy.

Create a basic chatbot using rule-based NLP

roadmap.title: Advanced NLP
roadmap.description: Learn word embeddings, transformers, attention mechanisms, and modern NLP frameworks like Hugging Face Transformers.

Develop a question-answering system using BERT or GPT
